post.body: Aww, man. Are you going to get another day as a "holiday" or are you gunna get time-and-a-half?
Well, we celebrate midnight at different "times.." maybe it will crash every hour :-P p.s. TX NYE in T minus 4 hrs!
re: businesses being open on NYDay.. I know that hospitals are <_<
Happy Birthday, Abigayle! <3
Why is Kay crying at the pharmacy?? Cuz she's crying at 1am and I'm dreaming I'm working. I NEED A BREAK!
Working hard in the garage. I love being productive.
Driving down McPherson North blasting "Come Original" with the windows down brings me back to senior year. That was fun.
I hate Laredo drivers. Who's with me?
So i left factual notes in a few nurses' drawers and i sorta got in trouble for it. Whoops.
From Flickr: Lis311 posted a photo: http://tinyurl.com/7yp7eq
From Flickr: Lis311 posted a photo: http://tinyurl.com/7cccx5
Wow, I think I just saved the day (and quite possibly someone's life). That was pretty insane.
From Flickr: Lis311 posted a photo: http://tinyurl.com/84x9l6
From Flickr: Lis311 posted a photo: http://tinyurl.com/9oywex
FINALLY continuing to post pictures to my Flickr.. back from Dec14. Oh, did I mention my computer & network are up and running? :-D
Why am i so zoned out today?
Working the evening shift is weird. Unless I'm actually walking meds to the floors, time just CRAWLS!
My dad is so sweet. I left my phone @ home and he brought it to me.. and then he went to get me an early dinner because I was starving. :-)
Just dropped off the moving truck. I can't believe we finished unloading tonight! I have an AWESOME family. <3
Just stopped in Cotulla. Should be home in just over an hour.
